titleInfo.title: C.M. Hall of Fame Luncheon at the Governor's Mansion 1999-09-23 Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame© and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: The recording is of the Country Music Hall of Fame Luncheon at the Governor's Mansion. The luncheon features a performance from Marty Stuart (musician), Cindy Walker (musician) and Randy Scruggs (musician). Additionally, the luncheon features speakers: Kyle Young (C. M. president), Don Sundquist (governor), Bruce Hilton, Sherry Bond, and Susan Bond. The luncheon is for the winners of the Country Music Association Awards and the opening of the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on 5th Ave. Nashville, Tennessee. The recording is from September 23, 1999. The tape is part 2 of 2.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
